## Checklist
- [ ] I have run `terraform fmt` on all my code
- [ ] I have run `terraform validate` and it passes
- [ ] I have run `infracost breakdown` and verified costs are within limits
- [ ] I have tested my infrastructure deployment
- [ ] I have included all required tags (Name, Environment, ManagedBy, AutoTeardown, Student)
- [ ] I have verified no hardcoded credentials are in my code
- [ ] I have updated any required documentation
